author: vors
body:
We should try to leverage AppVeyor's ability to use Azure images for build machines and the fact that Azure provides image of Server 2016 with containers support.
It may be possible to move our test infrastructure for NanoPS as is into appveyor.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Taking in account our current testing plan, we don't need this

title: Investigate AppVeyor with Server 2016 containers to test NanoPS
